sentences.sContent: One who practices or advocates allopathy.
sentences.sCn: 属于、关于或实施对抗疗法的。

sentences.sContent: Of or relating to the practice of allopathy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of or relating to the practice of allopathy.
sentences.sCn: 属于、关于或实施对抗疗法的。

trans.tranOther: the orthodox medical method of treating disease, by inducing a condition different from or opposed to the cause of the disease
